message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away your share!
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money.  Let's end this quickly and avoid any further inflation.
Bob, time is literally money for you!  I'm feeling generous, so take this deal before inflation takes another bite out of your share.

Alice, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money 40/60, with me taking the smaller share. This will give you the majority, but also allow me to recover a decent portion before the inflation gets too bad.
